issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fixVersions.description: Maintenance release with new AMQP support and smaller modules

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Index page overflow (when a value does not fit in a page) can lead to duplicate calls to free

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: AMQ not starting when using default heart beat

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
duplicated by https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-4118
a 5.8 snapshot can be used to validate.

Hi Gary,
Any idea where I can download 5.8.0 snapshot. It seems I need an access to bamboo ? 
Best regards

Dawid
